title: A genuinely scary movie
review: I loved that this movie scared me without jump scares and Toni Collette is incredible.

title: Greatest comedy
review:
For me this was the greatest comedy with a special kind of humor.
The makeup was great, the actors were chosen well and the action is very exciting.
This movie got all the things you are searching for:
comedy!
drama! 
adventure! 
action! 
great actors!
